desc: Gaia Smiles offers clean products for your dirty mouth. Designed by a Kelowna-native holistic nutritionist, the tooth powder is vegan, non-toxic, & zero-waste, crafted in small batches. We make our products with mineral-rich bentonite clay, restorative xylitol, & brightening calcium.

layout.text:
YOUR NEW
DREAM ORAL CARE ROUTINE

This is our oral care wonderland where we believe intentional routines make for an impactful life. We do tooth and mouth care as nature intended. Certified Cruelty Free. Zero-waste refillable packaging.
